channel.title: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?
channel.description:
Basically I leeched a hell of a server. I don't know much about coding. Anyway before I make this server public I wanted to add spawn for Admin+ but I don't know how to get all those long ass code things or where to put it XD. I know I sound like a huge noob right now but please help D:
I also have a lot of other things I wanna learn how to do, etc. giving an item extreme stats, making a donator zone, also I think the server needs more pvm things, because this server is just pking and I would like to add stuff like godwars, kbd..stuff like that. please help :)

item.title: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?
item.dc:creator: @l2spel l2spel
item.description:
@l2spel wrote:

I think, since I leeched the source those blank white paper file things cannot open for me so maybe I can’t really edit it? I can only edit some, like the player right, stats etc…
so i guess i cant do that, idk

EDIT: its a 317 PI based

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?

item.title: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Dobbs Mod Dobbs
item.description:
@Mod_Dobbs wrote:

dude, it depends on what server you’re hosting…

if it’s a 508 or 317 with a 508 cache/source, then there will be a file called commands.java

sometimes commands are put in client.java

If you want help with making some commands i’ll give you some basic ones you’ll need for ur server…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?

@FL_Oblivion wrote:

In your server folder search for, commandhandler

item.source: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?

item.title: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?
item.dc:creator: @l2spel l2spel
item.description:
@l2spel wrote:

[quote=“P A N I C, post:3, topic:390963”]if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights <= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 4151 1"); } } }[/quote]

Like I said, I don’t know where to put the code :
sorry for my lack of knowledge in coding

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?

item.title: How do I add spawn for Admin+ in my 317 PI?
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights <= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 4151 1"); } } }

Read full topic
